description: This course will provide you with a basic understanding of some of the steps in a Small Claims case as well as information on simple legal procedures. You will explore California State Court websites that are designed to help you navigate the Small Claims process. View the websites in your State for local information. There is also an emphasis on the need for the services of Attorneys, Small Claims Court Advisors and Court Staff. This course will equip you with some basic knowledge to understand how Small Claims Court works.
title: The Basics of Small Claims Court
